episodes.title: Heaven and Hell: The Dark Truth Behind NZ’s Centrepoint & Gloriavale Cults
episodes.description:
Step inside two of New Zealand’s most notorious communities—Centrepoint and Gloriavale. This video explores the disturbing realities behind their promises of utopia, revealing stories of control, manipulation, and abuse from those who lived through it. Featuring survivor testimonies and documentary footage from Heaven and Hell: The Centrepoint Story, Gloriavale (2022), and Escaping Utopia (2025).

Trigger Warning: This video discusses themes of child abuse, sexual abuse, and religious exploitation. Viewer discretion is advised.

#CentrepointNZ #Gloriavale #HeavenAndHellDocumentary #NZDocumentary #CultSurvivors #RealStories #ExposingTheTruth #ReligiousAbuse #SurvivorVoices #EscapingUtopia #NewZealandHistory #TrueCrimeDocumentary #CultDocumentary #GloriavaleExposed #CentrepointCult
